revision.text: Possibly: Letters on the English and French Nations; containing Curious and useful Observations on their Constitutions natural and political; Nervous and humorous Descriptions of the Virtues, Vices, Ridicules and Foibles of the Inhabitants: Critical Remarks on their Writers; Together with Moral Reflections interspersed throughout the Work. In Two Volumes. By Mons. L'Abb√© Le Blanc. (Jean-Bernard Le Blanc). Translated from the Original French. 2v. (London : Printed for J. Brindley in New-Bondstreet; R. Francklin in Russel-Street, Covent-Garden; C. Davis in Holbourn; and J. Hodges, London-Bridge, MDCCXLVII. [1747]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2432577~S1
